name: OpenReplay
headline: Open-source, self-hosted, session replay tool for developers.
description: Open-source alternative to FullStory and LogRocket. Self-hosted for a complete control over your data and costs.

# Session replay you can self-host 
All you need to observe, measure and iterate on your product.
Self-Host  Try Cloud 
![Session Replay](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/icn_session-replay.svg)
#### Session Replay
See your product through your users' eyes, and identify underlying issues.
![DevTools](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/icn_devtools.svg)
#### DevTools
All the tools developers need to get to the root cause of any issue.
![Product Analytics](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/icn_product_analytics.svg)
#### Product Analytics
Create a user-centered, data-driven product that serves with user needs.
![Co-Browsing](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/icn_cobrowse.svg)
#### Co-Browsing
Engage with users when they need you. No meeting links. No downloads.
## Session Replay
  * understand what went wrong
  * Uncover issues and frustrations
  * Tailor your privacy settings


Replay  Summary AI  X-Ray  Session Notes  Custom Attributes  User Activity 
[Learn More ](https://www.openreplay.com/<product/feature/session-replay.html>)
![Session Replay](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-a_session_replay.svg) ![Session summary by AI](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-b_session_replay_summary_ai.svg) ![Session XRay](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-b_session_replay_x-ray.svg) ![Session Notes](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-c_session_replay_collab.svg) ![User Activity](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-b_session_replay_user_activity.svg) ![User Activity](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-b_session_replay_custom_attributes.svg)
## DevTools
  * Reproduce bugs exactly as they occurred
  * Capture errors, logs, network payloads
  * Diagnose crashes and slowdowns


Console  Network  Performance  Custom Events  State Monitor 
[Learn More ](https://www.openreplay.com/<product/feature/devtools.html>)
![DevTools Console](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-a_devtools_console.svg) ![DevTools Network](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-b_devtools_network.svg) ![session replay](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-c_devtools_performance.svg) ![Custom Events](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-c_devtools_custom_events.svg) ![State Monitoring](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-c_devtools_state_monitor.svg)
## Product Analytics
  * Observe and analyze user behavior
  * Prioritize what matters and meet your KPIs
  * Enable efficient collaboration for all


Funnels  Path Analysis  Heatmaps  Trends  Browsers  Issues  Slowest Resources 
[Learn More ](https://www.openreplay.com/<product/feature/product-analytics.html>)
![Funnel Chart](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-a_pa_conversion.svg) ![Path Analysis](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-b_pa_path_analysis.svg) ![Heatmap](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-b_heatmap.svg) ![Sessions Trend](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-c_pa_trend.svg) ![Browsers](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-b_browsers.svg) ![Issues](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-b_pa_issues.svg) ![Slow Resources](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-b_pa_slowest_resources.svg)
## Co-Browsing
  * View live sessions, co-browse with customers
  * Shorten your time to resolution
  * Level up your support experience


Co-Browse  Video Call  Annotate  Remote Control  Multi-Sessions View 
[Learn More ](https://www.openreplay.com/<product/feature/assist-co-browsing.html>)
![Co-Browsing](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-a_cobrowising.svg) ![Co-Browsing Call](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-b_cobrowising_call.svg) ![Co-Browse Annotate](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-c_cobrowising_annotate.svg) ![Remote Control](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-c_cobrowising_remoteControl.svg) ![Multi-Session View](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/hero/sb1-c_cobrowising_multiSession.svg)
Simplifying product engineering at
![Nvidia](https://www.openreplay.com/images/companies/nvidia.svg)
![Mercedes Benz](https://www.openreplay.com/images/companies/mercedes.svg)
![LG](https://www.openreplay.com/images/companies/lg.svg)

## Benefits for Teams
Understand and fix issues faster. No more back-and-forth.
Engineering
Product
Support
Engineering Product Customer Support
Replay issues with logs, errors and network calls.
See where your users are struggling. Uncover issues causing conversion and revenue loss.
Co-browse and call your users — in real-time — as they browse your site and need support.
## Deployment Options
Host your session replay tool yourself and stop sending data to third parties.
![Self-host Plan](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/icn_install_selfhost.svg)
### Self-Hosted
Deploy it anywhere and keep full control over your data.
[ Community Edition](https://www.openreplay.com/<deploy.html>) Free. Source available 
[ Enterprise Edition](https://www.openreplay.com/<deploy.html>) [Enterprise-ready security and scale.](https://www.openreplay.com/<enterprise.html>)
![Cloud Plan](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/icn_install_cloud.svg)
### Cloud
All core features. Get started for free in a few clicks.
[ Dedicated ](https://www.openreplay.com/<pricing.html>) Dedicated instance. Billed hourly.
[ Serverless](https://www.openreplay.com/<pricing.html>) For low or variable traffic.
## Privacy and Security
OpenReplay uses industry-standard technologies and services to encrypt and secure data from end to end. Besides, we build in the open. Our codebase is available on GitHub for audit.
[Learn More ](https://www.openreplay.com/<enterprise.html>)
![SOC2 Type II Certified](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/badges_safety.svg)
![Compiance](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/icn_compliance.svg)
#### Compliance Friendly
No more lengthy compliance and security checks. Deploy on your servers and avoid unwanted 3rd processors.
![Data Security](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/icn_data_security.svg)
#### Data Security and Controls
Audit our codebase or supercharge it by building your own plugins and services.
![Privacy Controls](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/icn_privacy_controls.svg)
#### Privacy Controls
Fine-grained privacy features for sanitizing user data.
![](https://www.openreplay.com/images/2024-jan/data-recording-otpions.svg)
#### Join the OpenReplay Movement
### 9.7k+![Github Stars](https://www.openreplay.com/images/starts-counting.svg)
Star us on GitHub  Join our Community
[![OpenReplay Logo](https://www.openreplay.com/images/logo-open-replay.svg)](https://www.openreplay.com/<https:/openreplay.com>)
OpenReplay is a session replay and analytics tool, built for developers and self-hosted for full control over your data.
![SOC 2 Type 2](https://www.openreplay.com/images/soc-badge.svg) SOC 2 Type 2 Compliant

generated_description:
### OpenReplay: The Open-Source Session Replay Tool

**Overview**  
OpenReplay is an innovative open-source session replay tool designed specifically for developers. Founded in 2018 and based in Paris, France, this company emerged as a self-hosted alternative to proprietary tools like FullStory and LogRocket. Its mission focuses on giving developers complete control over their data and costs, allowing them to truly own their analytics.

**Founding and Growth**  
OpenReplay is a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S19, reflecting its potential and entrepreneurial spirit. With a compact team of 11 employees, it’s nimble enough to adapt quickly while offering robust features. The company’s holistic approach ensures it meets a wide array of developer needs, reinforcing its commitment to the developer community.

**Core Offerings**  
The tools provided by OpenReplay help in tracking user interactions and improving product experiences. Key features include:

1. **Session Replay**: Explore user interactions to identify pain points and optimize the user experience.
2. **Product Analytics**: Analyze user behavior through funnels, heatmaps, and user activity data to better meet KPIs.
3. **DevTools**: Debug with direct insights into errors, logs, and performance metrics to quickly identify and resolve issues.
4. **Performance Monitoring**: Keep an eye on system performance to maintain a seamless user experience.
5. **Co-Browsing**: Enhance customer support by engaging users in real-time while they navigate your site.

**Deployment Options**  
OpenReplay offers flexibility with deployment. Users can choose to self-host the tool for complete data privacy or opt for a cloud solution, catering to various business needs. This adaptability makes it appealing for teams looking to maintain control over sensitive user data.

**Community and Compliance**  
With over 9,700 stars on GitHub, OpenReplay is building a vibrant community of developers embracing its open-source ethos. The platform prioritizes privacy and security, implementing industry-standard measures to ensure data is encrypted and safeguarded.

**Target Audience**  
OpenReplay specifically thrives in environments where a deep understanding of user interactions is critical. Engineering teams, product managers, customer support, and design teams all benefit from the insights provided by the tool. By simplifying the process of reviewing user experiences, OpenReplay streamlines product development and enhances support.

**Conclusion**  
OpenReplay stands out as a powerful ally for developers, marrying flexibility with comprehensive analytics capabilities. By merging open-source technology with profound insights into user behavior, it truly empowers teams to iterate and improve their products while keeping their data private. If you're looking to elevate your product’s user experience without surrendering control over your data, OpenReplay is certainly worth considering. 

For more information, check out their website: [OpenReplay](https://www.openreplay.com/).
